pullrequest.title: Fix include paths for new OGRE2 directory structure -> ign-cmake2

content.raw:
Note that I get a cmake error when running this with ign-rendering2 \+ ogre2 from the debs:

```
CMake Error in ogre2/src/CMakeLists.txt:
  Imported target "IgnOGRE2::IgnOGRE2" includes non-existent path

    "/usr/include/OGRE-2.1/Hlms/Common"
```

we could either add a check to see if the path exists first before appending to the include dirs or release new ogre2 debs from the tip version of the v2-1 branch.

CMake Error in ogre2/src/CMakeLists.txt:
